aspect-ratio--square.title: Square aspect ratio
aspect-ratio--square.description: Sets the element to a perfect 1:1 square aspect ratio.

aspect-ratio--1-2.title: 1:2 aspect ratio
aspect-ratio--1-2.description: Sets the element to a 1:2 aspect ratio (portrait orientation).

aspect-ratio--2-1.title: 2:1 aspect ratio
aspect-ratio--2-1.description: Sets the element to a 2:1 aspect ratio (landscape orientation).

aspect-ratio--2-3.title: 2:3 aspect ratio
aspect-ratio--2-3.description: Sets the element to a 2:3 aspect ratio (portrait orientation).

aspect-ratio--3-2.title: 3:2 aspect ratio
aspect-ratio--3-2.description: Sets the element to a 3:2 aspect ratio (landscape orientation).

aspect-ratio--3-4.title: 3:4 aspect ratio
aspect-ratio--3-4.description: Sets the element to a 3:4 aspect ratio (portrait orientation).

aspect-ratio--4-3.title: 4:3 aspect ratio
aspect-ratio--4-3.description: Sets the element to a 4:3 aspect ratio (landscape orientation).

aspect-ratio--16-9.title: 16:9 aspect ratio
aspect-ratio--16-9.description: Sets the element to a 16:9 aspect ratio (widescreen format).

aspect-ratio--9-16.title: 9:16 aspect ratio
aspect-ratio--9-16.description: Sets the element to a 9:16 aspect ratio (mobile portrait format).
